professional_summary: Versatile IT specialist with expertise across enterprise infrastructure, BIOS automation, PCI policy redesign, and regional end-user support. Certified in Microsoft Azure and information protection, and fluent in scripting across legacy and modern systems. Proven leader across high-stakes environments and client-facing operations.

work_experience.title: Desktop Support Technician (Urban)
work_experience.summary: Provided regional desktop support across Enbridge locations in Duluth and Superior. Supported Windows/Linux endpoints, VPN issues, installations, and escalations.
achievements: Maintained coverage across all metro facilities with rapid SLA response
Collaborated with cybersecurity and networking teams
Resolved complex device configurations in field environments

work_experience.title: IT Customer Service Representative
work_experience.summary: Delivered Tier 1/2 support across enterprise systems, including troubleshooting hardware and software under SLA conditions.
achievements: Resolved desktop, mobile, and network issues remotely
Translated complex issues into clear, user-friendly guidance
Maintained ticket flow using ServiceNow and Remedy

work_experience.title: New Technology Test Driver
work_experience.summary: Tested embedded systems in prototype vehicles and provided structured feedback for firmware and sensor refinement.
achievements: Identified telemetry gaps and edge-case behaviors
Improved vehicle UI/UX through real-world testing

work_experience.title: Bookkeeper and Yard Boss
work_experience.summary: Managed financial operations and supervised lumber yard logistics and safety.
achievements: Oversaw payroll, invoicing, and account reconciliation
Directed equipment operations and delivery coordination
Improved yard layout for safety and efficiency

work_experience.title: Scripting Engineer / Windows Systems Operator
work_experience.summary: Led automation of Out-of-Band Management for 25,000 servers. Built BIOS compatibility matrices and rewrote TLS access policies.
achievements: Deployed ILO/IMM/DRAC scripting across Windows, Linux, and VMware
Enabled segmented TLS via F5 proxy authentication
Achieved zero critical failures on BIOS automation rollout

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

microsoft: Windows NT 4.0 Server, Workstation, Network, RAS – 1996
